item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Oliver Heaviside and the theory of transmission lines (9 points | discuss)
2. Show HN: Making AR experiences is still painful – had to make my own editor (83 points | 15 comments)
3. Free Web Hosting Area (21 points | 11 comments)
4. Hedy: Textual programming made easy (126 points | 30 comments)
5. SiFive's P550 Microarchitecture – By Chester Lam (12 points | 1 comment)
6. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (290 points | 64 comments)
7. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (241 points | 93 comments)
8. Show HN: Bagels – TUI expense tracker (149 points | 54 comments)
9. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (487 points | 371 comments)
10. Supercharge SQLite with Ruby Functions (68 points | 24 comments)
11. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (215 points | 184 comments)
12. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (221 points | 80 comments)
13. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (116 points | 17 comments)
14. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (166 points | 83 comments)
15. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (173 points | 43 comments)
16. Halliday AR(Not?)/AI Glasses (5 points | 1 comment)
17. Once You're Laid Off, You'll Never Be the Same Again (204 points | 171 comments)
18. Shunpo: Minimalist bash tool to make directory navigation a little bit faster (75 points | 31 comments)
19. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (400 points | 44 comments)
20. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (237 points | 120 comments)
21. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (80 points | 10 comments)
22. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (146 points | 239 comments)
23. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts (69 points | 17 comments)
24. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (227 points | 71 comments)
25. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (446 points | 434 comments)
26. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (113 points | 21 comments)
27. Show HN: DeepSeek My User Agent (297 points | 119 comments)
28. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a Founding Account Executive in SF ( | hide)
29. Reviving a Dead Audio Format: The Return of ZZM (97 points | 5 comments)
30. The protester's guide to smartphone security (401 points | 193 comments)
